channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump-Putin summit on Ukraine is latest chapter in Alaska’s long history — and tension — with Russia
item.description: When U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin meet in Alaska on Friday, it will be the latest chapter in the 49th state’s long history with Russia — and with international tensions.

item.title: Parents and child killed when tree falls on car as heavy rain and flooding hit Tennessee
How to get kids back on a sleep schedule for the school year
